 IF YOU ARE UNDER 16 OR IN RECOVERY, DONâ€™T INTERACT WITH MY ACCOUNT. 
 mental illnesses have serious consequences if they arenâ€™t treated properly. i neither promote nor glamorise mental illnesses on this blog. it is just for myself to share my thoughts and struggles. reach for help as soon as possible if you are struggling. itâ€™s not weak or shameful thing to do. you deserve to recover and to have a healthy life. 
 

 about me:
   
 â€¢ you can call me ray

weâ€™re on vacation and iâ€™ve already walked 18k steps but my ed voice is so strong and rn iâ€™m walking even more in a totally new country and completely alone. just wish me luck to not get completely lost!
being unproductive because you're sad and being sad because you're unproductive. vicious cycle

back at itğŸ¥² hopefully i wonâ€™t have a brutal relapse but i just canâ€™t handle my anxiety. itâ€™s gotten so much worse since i stopped restricting. i also canâ€™t manage the weight gain. i canâ€™t accept my body looking like this.

i think i had an epiphany today. so, my mock exams for med school are coming up this weekend and i realised how much iâ€™m not prepared. i was way too focused on satisfying the ed voice and didnâ€™t have the energy or the mental capacity to be able to study properly. today my therapist said that i can always loose weight but my exams are one time thing. this hit me pretty hard, so now iâ€™m actually willing to give recovery a chance. why? because i want to be a doctor. i want to work in the mental health field. i want to be the change that this fucked up system needs. and the only way i achieve this is by prioritising my well being. i cannot afford to starve myself and expect good results. so this is my sort of goodbye at least for now. i find a great comfort in my eating disorder but i genuinely donâ€™t want to spend my life like this. 
 i want to say huge thank you to every single person who has ever interacted with my account in any way. you guys are the best. i wish you all the happiness in the world and please stay safeğŸ«¶ğŸ» 
 iâ€™m deleting the app. iâ€™ll be back on here in july after i get my results from the actual med school exams. so i guess see you in 3 monthsâ¤ï¸â€ğŸ©¹
 um hi again i guess? no, i havenâ€™t relapsed and iâ€™m not downloading tumblr again for the same purpose and iâ€™m in fact gonna log out of it after i finish writing this post. 
 so; i failed both exams in april i was talking about but thatâ€™s okay. since then iâ€™ve been studying a lot harder and i expect better results on the upcoming exams! 
 not going to lie recovery is not easy. today my therapist said that iâ€™m actually making progress. thereâ€™s still a long way to go but iâ€™m determined to make it happen. 
 so, see you in a month for another update on my exams and the journey of getting into med school.

Tired VS 
 Tired
 Fatigue is different to just being tired. 
 When youâ€™re tired, you know you can get some sleep and youâ€™ll feel better. 
 But fatigue is still there when you wake up, it stays with you all day. Itâ€™s a lack of energy. A feeling of mental, emotional and physical exhaustion.

people are clowning in the intersex tag again so reminders
 people with intersex variations can still be male or female
 being intersex never invalidates someones gender identity, someone can still be a man or woman despite being intersex
 being intersex can and often does AFFECT someones gender identity and may lead to a person who was assigned female at birth identifying as transfem due to sexual variation and being made to transition to female, etc
 intersex variations can be chromosomal, gonadal, genital, and/or hormonal variations
 chromosomal variations are not necessary to be intersex
 not even genetic variations are required to be intersex, as there is variations caused 
 by hormones taken by your parent while pregnant with you
 intersex is not a third sex
 the reason that things like pcos 
 can
  be considered intersex 
 if the person defines it that way for themself
  is because the condition is nearly indistinguishable from an agreed upon intersex variation named ncah
 intersex is a community term, not a diagnosis, doctors cannot diagnose you as 'intersex'
 what is and isnt intersex is decided by our community, not doctors

I literally cannot overstate how important creative hobbies are when dealing with mental illness. If you canâ€™t draw, there are coloring books. If you canâ€™t write a novel, you can write in short journaling bursts. If you canâ€™t sing in the shower, you can listen to music. Sometimes with mental illness it feels like we have this dark presence inside of us that is bumping around in our brain and organs, causing problems. It helps immensely to let it out.

Just a reminder: you are not responsible for anyone else's mental health. 
If you ever receive a message that is triggering, especially here on tumblr, you don't have to reply. You can report and block. Don't feel bad or guilty for protecting yourself: if you're not grounded enough, that could only make you spiral downward. So please, take care of yourself first. Even if you're so nice and kind and feel like helping out. Look after yourself first. You're not responsible for anyone else's mental health, especially complete strangers'.
